title: Can't transfer my acc from NA to Brazil?
body:
Hello, 

Today I've tried to transfer my account from NA to Brazil and I just can't find the transfer ticket on the store, in the account menu as I've done several times before. I've already bought RP only for the transfer and it would suck if I couldn't do this transaction. Could anyone help me?

Thanks,
Magrinho.

replies.body: They've been working on a fix for the transfer system for a while now, and are still fixing up some issues. It may still take a few more weeks, so you'll just have to be patient until it's available again. The [Transfer Service Update](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) thread was pinned, and was made just over 4 weeks ago. In that thread, they stated it may take another 5-6 weeks. Hopefully it will be working within the next 1 to 2 weeks!

Just here to confirm! Thanks for the quick answer while the poros were asleep Kokua!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Ohh, got it!

Thanks a lot my friend.

I hope so, I moved from America to South Africa recently and I just cannot handle the 250ms ping with de-sync issues included, I'm currently missing out on URF right now and that sucks so bad, I love URF ;-;
